{{Description|A unique chest that can be found only in Simulanka. Even the most experienced and knowledgeable Adventurers may find it difficult to resist the temptation of "Fairytale Troves." Opening these chests gives an extraordinary sense of accomplishment...|[[Map]] description}}
'''Fairytale Troves''' are [[chest]]s found during the [[Summertide Scales and Tales]] event around the [[Simulanka]] map that contain {{Item|Excerpts of Bliss|20|x=1}}. They take the form of Common, Exquisite, Precious, and Luxurious Chests.

After using the [[Jocund Letters]] or [[Joyous Letters]] Gadgets, they are marked as {{Icon|Fairytale Trove}}.
